body:
please respect our contribution guidelines. 
especially the issue template. 

we need more information on this issue.  thx

ok i couldn't find the issue template, but i'm trying to copy from other issue reports. if something's missing, please let me know what else you need.

expected behaviour
existing files should be encrypted after the enc. app is activated.

actual behaviour
from a frontend perspective, i was logged out after the app was activated. i then re-logged in. the page loads forever.
from the backend, i can see the key files on the server, but the actual files remain untouched. in the owncloud/data/owncloud.log file, i get endless tails of errors looking like this one:
* {"app":"hook","message":"error while running hook (\oc\files\cache\updater::renamehook): sqlstate[23000]: integrity constraint violation: 19 columns storage, path_hash are not unique","level":3,"time":1370728172} *
login in impossible. the app cannnot be deactivated through web.

steps to reproduce
none. can only occure once.

server configuration
* debian linux kernel 2.6.32-042stab074.10 #1 smp i686 gnu/linux (32bit)
* apache/2.2.16 (debian)
* sqlite
* # dpkg -s owncloud   -> package: owncloud, status: install ok installed, version: 5.0.7-0
* browser chrome 27.0 on win7sp1

@mwissel can you please provide apache error logs? are you running sync clients?
how many files do you have?

ok, but there's nothing in the error.log that looks related to me.

[sat jun 08 21:06:40 2013] [error] [client xyxyxy] client denied by server configuration: /var/www/owncloud/data/htaccesstest.txt
[sat jun 08 21:06:40 2013] [error] [client xyxyxy] file does not exist: /var/www/core
premature end of jpeg file
[sat jun 08 21:12:20 2013] [error] [client yzyzyzyz] file does not exist: /var/www/favicon.ico
[sat jun 08 21:12:31 2013] [error] [client xyxyxy] client denied by server configuration: /var/www/owncloud/data/htaccesstest.txt
[sat jun 08 21:12:31 2013] [error] [client xyxyxy] file does not exist: /var/www/core
[sat jun 08 21:12:48 2013] [error] [client yzyzyzyz] file does not exist: /var/www/favicon.ico
[sat jun 08 21:18:15 2013] [error] [client xyxyxy] client denied by server configuration: /var/www/owncloud/data/htaccesstest.txt
[sat jun 08 21:18:15 2013] [error] [client xyxyxy] file does not exist: /var/www/core
[sat jun 08 21:49:34 2013] [notice] caught sigterm, shutting down
[sat jun 08 21:49:35 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate is a ca certificate (basicconstraints: ca == true !?)
[sat jun 08 21:49:35 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate commonname (cn) xyxyxyxy does not match server name!?
[sat jun 08 21:49:35 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate is a ca certificate (basicconstraints: ca == true !?)
[sat jun 08 21:49:35 2013] [warn] rsa server certificate commonname (cn) xyxyxyxy does not match server name!?
[sat jun 08 21:49:35 2013] [notice] apache/2.2.16 (debian) mod_ssl/2.2.16 openssl/0.9.8o configured -- resuming normal operations

that's all i have. 21:49 was my intentional restart after i could not log in.

i am running the windows client, but i'm 99% sure it was not syncing at the time.

there are roundabout 2600 files in one user directory in total.
fixed in master and stable5, will be released with the next bug-fix release
